entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to periods of rain or drizzle this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then steady. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
